attributes.action: Open Theatres now... Cinemas are open planes carry passengers  open Theatres now
attributes.additional_details: Get Theatres open to save thousands of jobs that rely on attendances for their income and some of the govt taxes
attributes.background: Open up Theatres to allow people to enjoy the productions improve mental health and keep many in work  it needs to be done Now before it's too late

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Theatres and other arts venues are not banned from opening, but must operate within Government guidance on social distancing.

It is a matter for individual operators to decide if they can safely operate within these guidelines. You can find out more about these here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/working-safely-during-coronavirus-covid-19/performing-arts#arts-3-1
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example if you would like social distancing restrictions removed to allow theatres to operate at full capacity, you could start a petition calling for this to happen.
